content: Call integration agent for Coinbase Advanced, Gemini, and Helius to get implementation playbooks
Install required backend dependencies (websockets, aiohttp, prometheus-client, solana-py, anchorpy)
Install required frontend dependencies (recharts, framer-motion for animations)
Set up monorepo structure (apps/, packages/) with core packages (shared, config, telemetry)
Implement Coinbase Advanced connector with WS L2 book + REST IOC orders (sandbox/mock mode)
Implement Gemini connector with WS L2 book + REST IOC orders (sandbox/mock mode)
Implement Solana DEX connector with Helius RPC/WS + pool math (x*y=k and CLMM)
Build in-memory event bus for POC with typed event models (cex.bookUpdate, dex.poolUpdate, exec.try, exec.result)
Implement signal engine (PnL computation with fees/impact/haircut, windowing, threshold detection)
Implement execution engine with dual-leg orchestration, idempotency keys, retry logic, partial hedge stubs
Set up MongoDB repository pattern with collections (opportunities, trades, windows, configs, inventory)
Implement Prometheus metrics (latency, opportunities, trades, staleness) and structured logging
Build FastAPI gateway with REST endpoints (/v1/status, /v1/opportunities, /v1/trades, /v1/controls) and WebSocket
Apply design system tokens from design_guidelines.md to index.css and tailwind.config.js
Build React UI foundation: Layout with top bar, left sidebar, main content area (dark + lime theme)
Implement Overview screen with KPI cards (Net PnL, Capture Rate, Latency, Active Windows) + sparklines
Implement Opportunities screen with live table, filters, and real-time updates
Implement Trades screen with ledger table and CSV export functionality
Implement status indicators with pulse animations (lime=healthy, amber=degraded, red=down)
Implement OBSERVE-ONLY toggle and pause/resume controls in UI
Wire up WebSocket connection from UI to gateway for real-time updates
Implement staleness kill-switch (>10s WS gap → pause + banner alert)
Create basic Grafana dashboard JSON for latency p50/p95, opportunity rate, staleness gauges
Test end-to-end flow: mock data → signal → exec.try → persist → UI display with <200ms staleness
Call testing agent for Phase 1: unit tests + integration tests for connectors, signal engine, executor
